xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" tools:ignore="MissingTranslation" tools:ignore="ExtraTranslation" A new way to use your phone About Get the Pro version to:
 - Unlock a second edge
 - Customize column count and row count of Grid favorites
 - Unlock support for icon packs
 - Pin shortcuts to Recent Apps
 - Auto-disable Swiftly Switch in full screen apps About Pro version Access your favorite shortcut anywhere The accessibility service is needed for navigation (home, back, power menu) and on some Samsung devices for expanding the status bar. Settings Actions Add new Required for lock screen action Phone administrator permission Allow Swiftly Switch with admin permissions to enable the screen lock. Using this shortcut requires setting Swiftly Switch as an administrator. This means that the app CAN NOT be uninstalled unless you disable the permission first. Always visible Swiftly Switch Pro Apps, shortcuts, … OK Apps Tap here and grant the "Write settings" for Swiftly Switch Swiftly Switch needs the "Write settings" permission Please turn on the accessibility service for Swiftly Switch This feature is only available for Android 6.0 and above. For lower Android versions, you can enable/disable the edges from the persistent notification. Auto Avoid keyboard Prevent the app from interfering with the keyboard Place under keyboard Step aside keyboard Backup "Backup, Import settings" Backup fail The backup file will be stored in your Google Drive. Please connect to your Google account and then choose the folder to upload. Backed up successfully Battery life: Brightness Call Can not delete Can not delete, being used in: Can not delete, this is the only one Choose Choose action Choose Recent Set Set Actions Apps Choose shortcut type Circle Favorite set Circle favorites Place a small set of your favorite shortcuts in a semi-circle manner Columns count Connecting custom home home fax main other pager work work fax Contacts Current set Default action for contacts Delete this "Device's shortcuts" Disable in full screen apps Disable top indicator Downloading Easy navigation Bottom centre Left bottom Left centre Left top Right bottom Right centre Right top Cancel Default Default OK Circle size Length Mode Offset Position Sensitivity Recent App Switcher Circle Favorite and Quick Actions Grid Favorite Recent apps and Quick Actions Please fill out appropriate information!

 Bug report:

 Suggestion:

 Question:

 Additional information:

 Email us Empty Enable 3. Enable Accessibility Enable accessibility permission Enable assistant app 1. Enable Floating Window By setting Swiftly Switch as your assistant app (instead of Google Now on Tap), you can enable/disable trigger edges at any time by long-pressing the home button. 2. Enable Usage Statistics Lag when launching apps from the home screen Swiftly Switch can't start apps within 5 seconds from the moment you return to the Home screen. This is the how Android limit services. It's not a problem if you return home using the in-app Home shortcut. Why I can't uninstall the app on my device? You can uninstall the app as other applications. If you have set the app to "Device administrator" (for the screen lock shortcut), you'll need to disable it first: Settings > Security > Device administrators > disable the option for Swiftly Switch. Closed apps do not disappear from recent apps list Due to a limitation from Android 5.0, 3rd-party apps can only access the list of your recently used apps but not the list of currently running apps on your device. How to automatically disable the app when playing games? Go to "More settings" and turn on "Disable in full screen apps" or "Disable in landscape mode" How to hide the notification? The persistent notification is needed to keep Swiftly Switch active in the background but you can hide it by blocking all of the notifications from Swiftly Switch. To hide it, tap the notification > Hide notification > Block notification. Problem on Huawei devices Please try to turn on the option for Swiftly Switch in Dropzone Manager. Also turn on the option for Swiftly Switch in "Protected Apps" setting to keep it running in the background. Problem on OnePlus devices Please turn off the Deep Clear option in Setting. Deep Clear will stop all the background process once you exit the app. Problem on Xiaomi devices On MIUI 7, you need to enable the "Display pop-up" permission to make it work. Go to Settings > Apps > Swiftly Switch > Permission > Display pop-up > restart the app. 

On MIUI 8, you need to lock the app in the recent apps screen and turn off the Background Restriction. To lock the app in the recent apps screen: Press the Recent button > Swipe down the overview picture that indicates Swiftly Switch > Tap the Lock icon.

 To turn off the Background restriction: Setting > Battery and performance > Manage apps battery usage > Choose Apps > Swiftly Switch > Tap on "No restrictions". What is "Screen overlay detected"? This is a security feature of Android 6.0 and above. It gets triggered when granting permissions to an app while a "floating app" (screen overlay) is running. When this happens, just trigger Swiftly Switch by swiping in from the edge - Swiftly Switch will automatically pause for 10 seconds so you can grant the permissions as normal. Alternatively, you can pause Swiftly Switch through the notification and resume it after you're done. Why there is no shortcut for switching mobile network or airplane mode? Due to restrictions from Android, Swiftly Switch does not have the authority to directly access and switch your mobile network or airplane mode. FAQs Feel Full edge General Go to setting Grid Favorite set Grid Favorites "Place a large set of your favorite shortcuts here. Tap to set size, content and position" Center of screen Trigger position Hide notification Horizontal margin System Import shortcuts and settings from backup file Choose the backup file from Google Drive. Import Initializing data Instant launch disabled Instant launch enabled Last app Long-press action Choose the action to perform when you long-press one of the items Time needed to trigger second stage or open folder Look Animation duration Animation Upgrade to Pro Disable clock Disable in landscape mode Edge 1 Edge 2 Get Pro version Enable/disable edges by long-pressing home button Set apps that will not be listed in the recent list Blacklist Hold one of the recent icons for a while to show the Favorite Shortcut section. Tap the settings icon to set your favorite items and their positions. Haptic feedback on icons Haptic feedback on trigger Long-press delay Set icon pack Icon size More customization for the look and feel of the app More settings Quick actions Quick actions are placed outside of recent apps semi-circle, tap the settings icon to customize it Set background color Can not find this setting on your device. Please try to enable it manually. Vibration duration Media Missing call phone permission Missing contact-related permission Close navigation drawer Open navigation drawer No No action Note: Keep your finger on the screen unless you want to finish the action Notification This persistent notification is required for Swiftly Switch to stay active in the background. You may hide it by tapping and holding the notification and selecting "Block all notifications".

If you see the "Screen overlay detected" warning when giving a permission to another app, please pause Swiftly Switch temporarily using the "Pause" button on the notification.

Or just swipe in from the edge, Swiftly Switch will be paused for 10s automatically when you're in giving permission window. Pause if you see the "Screen Overlay Detected". Tap here for more details. Swiftly Switch is running… One or more permissions are missing Only triggered one visible Open folder delay Open Swiftly Switch Pause Swiftly Switch: Auto-pause for 10s while granting permissions. Change this in Swiftly Switch settings. //What new
VERSION 3.1.6:
 - New action: Search Shortcuts - Quickly search and start apps, shortcuts, contacts from any screen
 - Support Greek and update translation for Japanese, Persian. Thanks for your support!
 - Option to enable system animation when switching between apps
 - Fix bugs and some small improvements

VERSION 3.1.4 & 3.1.5:
 - Quick fix

VERSION 3.1.3:
 - Create a widget to pause/resume the app from the home screen
 - Prevent shortcuts from being cut off
 - Updated translations. Contribute your translation at https://www.localize.im/v/xy
 - Fix bugs and some small improvements

VERSION 3.1.2:
 - Fixed: last app shortcut does not work in some situations
 - Updated translations for: Italian, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese,, Slovak, Russian
 - Check out our new app: Journal it! - a powerful journal/diary app that makes journaling on mobile easy and delightful. Tap the "Check Out" button below to visit the app's page

VERSION 3.1.1:
 - Fixed: screenshot does not appear in the gallery after taken
 - Updated translations for: German, Czech, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Italian. Contribute your translation at: localize.im/v/xy

VERSION 3.1.0:
 - Added screenshot action (require android 5.0 and write storage permission)
 - Upgrade from free to pro by in-app purchase (for free version only)
 - Updated translations for: Persian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish. Thanks for your contribution!

VERSION 3.0.12:
 - Quick fix

VERSION 3.0.11:
 - Fix delay when start apps from home screen
 - Fix bug that sometimes makes recent icons disappear
 - Fix visual problem in RTL languages
 - Update translation for: Japanese, Spanish, Norwegian, Dutch. Thanks for all that help me translate the app! You can always contribute at https://www.localize.im/v/xy

VERSION 3.0.10:
 - Fix icon pack's bugs
 - Option to reset icon to default
 - Customize folder's icon (Pro)
 - Fix crashes
 - Update translation for Chinese, Czech, Dutch, French, German, Hebrew, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese. Thanks for all that help me translate the app! 

VERSION 3.0.9:
 - Quick fix

VERSION 3.0.8:
 - Help me translate the app to your language (Left panel -> Translate the app) 
 - Customize shortcut label and icon (pro)
 - Support mask from icon pack
 - Option for Ringer Mode shortcut: switch between Sound and Silent (More Settings)
 - Update Persian translation
 - Fix background color when animation time is too small
 - Other bug fixes and improvements

VERSION 3.0.1, the biggest update:
 - New beautiful Material design with new animation 
 - Different settings/contents for each edge 
 - Item count can be up to 8 in Recent/Circle favorite/Quick Actions 
 - New operating mode for edge: Circle favorite and Quick Actions
 - Quick Actions: allow every kind of shortcuts, more visibility option, instant shortcut
 - Option to keep content on-screen after lifting your finger (enabled by default)
 - Backup/Import data to/from Google Drive ("Internet" permission added)
 - Option to auto-disable in full screen apps (Pro)
 - Fix "Screen overlay detected": Auto-pause for 10 seconds while granting permissions in Android 6.0
 - Improve performance
 - About, FAQs, What's new, Privacy policy VERSION 3.0.2:
 - Fix setting space between shortcuts doesn't work 
 - Fix no icon for Shortcuts Set 
 - Fix Grid position when triggered from long press 
 - Fix crashes VERSION 3.0.3:
 - Add Persian translation 
 - Fix layout problem in RTL language 
 - Fix crashes in KitKat 
 - Fix other bugs VERSION 3.0.4:
 - Set Shortcuts Set label 
 - Option to remove folder opening delay (More settings) 
 - Fix Quick Actions too big on Android 4.4 
 - Fix positioning of folders
 - Fix can not delete Grid item
 - Other improvements VERSION 3.0.5:
 - Fix positioning of folders
 - Fix can not delete Grid item VERSION 3.0.6:
 - Fix can not delete Grid item VERSION 3.0.7:
 - Option to disable top indicator 
 - Auto update contact photos
 - Quick Actions's item count can set to 3
 - Improve getting recent apps
 - Minimum animation time can set to 0
 - Option to set the edge's length to full screen height by sliding the length to max in Trigger Zone Settings
 - Fix the Grid being cut off when Edge's position set to bottom 
 - Fix UI bugs in RTL language 
 - Fix can not delete items in Grid Settings
 - Fix Grid Favorite being reset
 - Fix changing shortcuts set label
 - Small bugs fixed and improvements "Write settings" permission Swiftly Switch needs the "Write settings" permission to perform this action. Please find Swiftly Switch in the device's app settings and enable the permission. Yes You have not granted all the necessary permissions yet. Please try again.

Recent Apps only Circle Favorite only Quick Actions only Close Using this shortcut requires setting Swiftly Switch as an administrator. This means that the app CAN NOT be uninstalled unless you disable the permission first. Set Swiftly Switch as your Device Administrator at Settings -> Security -> Device Administrators
